text: 380px Nativity is a c.1380 tempera and gold on panel painting by Simone dei Crocifissi, now the only 14th century Bolognese work in the Uffizi in Florence Gloria Fossi, Uffizi, Giunti, Firenze 2004. . It is signed "Simon" and – stylistically close to another Nativity (Davia Bargellini Collection, Bologna) – it belongs to the painter's mature period. ==References== category:1380s paintings category:Paintings of the Uffizi Simone category:Paintings of Saint Joseph Category:Cattle in art Category:Donkeys in art
title: Nativity (Simone dei Crocifissi)
